    • sendMail

      private static void sendMail​(String NameTemplate, String destination, String obj, String title1, String title2, String msg) throws javax.mail.MessagingException, IOException
      Send mail method.
      Parameters:
      NameTemplate - the name template to apply
      destination - the destination email
      obj - the object of mail
      title1 - the first title
      title2 - the second title
      msg - the message to write
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException - the messaging exception
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
